Question
========
  
Which of the following hypotheses is the most flexible?

Ha: µ1 < µ2 Hb: µ1 > µ2

  
Answerlist
----------
* Ha
* Hb
* Both are equally flexible.
* That cannot be said without the null hypothesis.
